trustfund:
TF093358-MDF - ACEH ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
            FINANCING FACILITY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Aceh Economic
            Development Financing Facility Project (EDFF) for Indonesia
            were as follows: outcomes were moderately unsatisfactory;
            risk to development outcome was high; bank performance was
            moderately unsatisfactory; and grantee performance was
            moderately unsatisfactory. Some lessons learned included:
            post-disaster and/or post-conflict operations, These are a
            valuable type of operation and highly likely to recur. The
            EDFF experience indicates that planning for these activities
            should start at a relatively early stage, as an integral
            part of reconstruction activities. Government of Indonesia
            with Non-Governmental Organization(GOI-NGO) collaboration,
            more time needed or more limited objectives, complexity,
            replication, procurement, dual oversight systems, the model
            approach, and sub-project selection.
